content: If you've got a good idea of his attack patterns, using the Smash Stance's varied combo to "see through" his attacks can be extremely useful to power through his slices to hit him while he's unable to defend, and the follow-up heavystrike you can unlock usually can't be blocked by him either.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-White' and the sub-subsection 'Non-White Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you've got a good idea of his attack patterns, using the Smash Stance's varied combo to "see through" his attacks can be extremely useful to power through his slices to hit him while he's unable to defend, and the follow-up heavystrike you can unlock usually can't be blocked by him either.
